mapper.sql: a.officeid AS "officeid", a.userid AS "userid", a.user_type AS "userType", so.name AS "officeName", su.name AS "userName", a.id AS "id", su.photo AS "photo", su.login_name AS "loginName", su.score AS "score", su.english_name AS "englishName", su.mobile AS "mobile"
left join sys_office so on a.officeid=so.id left join sys_user su on a.userid=su.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user_office( officeid, userid, user_type, id ) VALUES ( #{officeid}, #{userid}, #{userType}, #{id} )
